sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for April 2 - 3

day: Ramp and Lane Closures Scheduled for I-75/I-64 at the Southern Split:
event: Friday April 1 at 7 p.m. thru Monday April 4 at 5:30 a.m.  Closure in effect 24 hrs/day.

day: Ramp and Lane Closures Scheduled for I-75/I-64 at the Southern Split:
event: I-75N Exit 111 ramp to I-64E will be closed for resurfacing preparation work.

day: Ramp and Lane Closures Scheduled for I-75/I-64 at the Southern Split:
event: I-64E right and middle lanes will be closed between mile markers 81 and 82.3.

day: Ramp and Lane Closures Scheduled for I-75/I-64 at the Southern Split:
event: Motorists on I-75N may use Exit 113 to I-75S to I-64E.

day: Ramp and Lane Closures Scheduled for I-75/I-64 at the Southern Split:
event: Motorists traveling eastbound on Winchester Rd may use Haley Rd to access I-64E.
Central Kentucky Home & Garden Show at the Central Bank Center at 10 a.m.
Toughest Monster Truck Tour at Rupp Arena at 2 p.m.
Central Kentucky Home & Garden Show at the Central Bank Center at 11 a.m.
